pr_title: Support for Jakarta mail 2.0 issue 11860 reintroduce reversion Issue 14079

timeline.bodyText:
suggested edit:
This feature allows applications to use the Jakarta Mail 2.0 API.

timeline.message: Issue 14047: clean up of Jakarta mail

timeline.bodyText: I don't think these two dependencies are needed are they? Only the jakarta.mail one above them
timeline.author: tevans78

replies.bodyText: hmm.. Not sure why they are showing up as new. The should be needed for javamail 1.5 and 1.6....
replies.author: uberskigeek

replies.bodyText:
Ah, it is because Chuck has switched those two to build from source. So they are here instead...

  
    
      open-liberty/dev/cnf/oss_source_dependencies.maven
    
    
         Line 6
      in
      7c58e0f
    
    
    
    

        
          
           com.sun.mail:javax.mail:1.6.2 
        
    
  


I'm pretty sure that you don't want to add them back in here but if in doubt, check with @cbridgha
replies.author: tevans78
